tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Clear instructions from Doctor about proceedings after taking the x-ray and Clarification on the issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Zeenath Ma'am was friendly and made sure to explain in detail whatever the problem was and how does she plan to go about treating it. She ensured that the whole process was done smoothly with short breaks in between allowing the patient to be relaxed and at ease.  She also promptly answered any additional queries the patient had. The care and dedication with which Ma'am and everyone else at the clinic treats the patients is admirable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to Yash Dental for my root canal treatment. And I must say that I had a very good experience with the doctor. She explained the entire root canal procedure very clearly as she was doing it. She was quite friendly and quick to respond to any queries related to RCT. Overall, I had a nice experience at YASH Dental care. And I would recommend the Doctor to anyone who's looking for such a treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: To put it in a nutshell, it's a wonderful experience. Doctor was so friendly to my daughter and made the treatment a seamless. She engaged my daughter very well such that she is not getting panic. She explained about the reason on why what and how to be cautious as well. As a parent we learnt a lot from Doctor. Awesome treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I came for treatment of mouth ulcer but got to know it was different problem. She explained the the problem very well. She was very friendly and trustworthy. The co nurses were also very kind and friendly. They handled with care.  They treated with respect also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Zeenath Parveen.s is pleasant and very PATIENT FRIENDLY.
When I first consulted Dr. Zeenath, I was afraid of IMPLANT and associated pain (85 yrs) from what I had heard.
Only on Dr. Zeenath's assurance that it will  not be painful at all and that 3 teeth extraction and 4 implants fixing will be completed in one sitting, I relented.
[  ] Dr. Zeenath was right and when she administered anaesthetic injection all over my mouth there was no pain. This suprised me as in my life  anaesthetic injection in mouth was never once  so painless. I owe a special thanks to Dr. Zeenath.
Today I have Fixed Denture with complete teeth in upper jaw enabling me to eat normally.
